did.abstract: Cassette tapes of oral history interviews with Sidney Hillman.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sidney Hillman Oral History Project #5633 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5619: ACWA Records 5619 OH: ACWA Oral History Project Records 5619/005: ACWA Bessie Hillman Papers 5674 OHM: ACWA Master Tapes of Interviews with Retirees 5674 OHT: ACWA Transcripts of Interviews with Retirees 5743 P: ACWA Photographs 5987 AV: Sidney Hillman Memorial Conference Tapes and Related Documents 6064m: Philoine Fried Collection of Sidney and Bessie Hillman Additional Documents and Memorabilia 6064 P: Philoine Fried Collection of Sidney and Bessie Abramowitz Hillman Photographs 6219: Sidney Hillman Collection of Correspondence from Franklin Delano Roosevelt and Harry Truman and Related Documents 6225 AV: Sidney and Bessie Hillman Recording Discs
